title: The Writer's Almanac -  Wednesday, January 22, 2020
description: It’s the 47th anniversary of the Supreme Court’s landmark Roe v. Wade ruling forbidding states from outlawing abortions in the first trimester.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the 47th anniversary of the Supreme Court’s landmark Roe v. Wade ruling forbidding states from outlawing abortions in the first trimester.
